articles.title: Kim Jong Un Watches Test of New-type Anti-Aircraft Guided Weapon System
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Watches Test of New-type Anti-Aircraft Guided Weapon System
 Pyongyang, May 28 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, chairman of the Workers' Party of Korea, chairman of the DPRK State Affairs Commission and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army (KPA), watched the test of new-type anti-aircraft guided weapon system organized by the Academy of National Defence Science.
					 The respected Supreme Leader was told about the test program for new weapon system at the observation post before ordering the start of its test-fire.
					
					 Watching the successful test, he said ardently:
					
					 Seeing such a perfect new-type anti-aircraft guided weapon system, I miss the General more a lot. That weapon system is a posthumous one the development of which had been guided by him with much effort since the start. The General would have been very glad to see this perfect weapon system as he had put his heart and soul into the work to bolster up the state anti-aircraft capability until the last moments of his life.
					
					 He told KPA commanding officers and officials of the academy that the weapon system's efficiency to detect and track targets has remarkably improved and its hitting accuracy has also increased, compared with those of last year. Some defects in the weapon system, discovered last year, were perfectly overcome to stand the test, he said, adding:  This weapon system, whose operation capability has been thoroughly verified, should be mass-produced to deploy in all over the country like forests so as to completely spoil the enemy's wild dream to command the air, boasting of air supremacy and weapon almighty.
					
					 He set forth highly important tasks for the strategy for development of modern anti-aircraft guided weapon system of Korean style.
					
					 Accompanying him were Hwang Pyong So, Ri Yong Gil, O Kum Chol, Kim Kwang Hyok, Ri Pyong Chol, Kim Jong Sik and Jong Sung Il

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Greets Ethiopian President
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Greets Ethiopian President
 Pyongyang, May 28 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, Sunday sent a message of greeting to Mulatu Teshome, president of Ethiopia, on the occasion of its national day.
					 The message expressed belief that the excellent relations of friendship and cooperation between the two countries would grow stronger, wishing the Ethiopian president greater success in his work for the development and prosperity of the country.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Greets President of Azerbaijan
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Greets President of Azerbaijan
 Pyongyang, May 28 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, Sunday sent a message of greeting to Ilham Aliyev, president of Azerbaijan, on the occasion of its national day.
					 Kim Yong Nam in the message expressed belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would grow stronger in the common interests. And he hoped that the Azerbaijan government and people would achieve bigger success in the work for progress and prosperity of the country under the leadership of the president.

articles.title: Ri Yong Ho Greets FM of Azerbaijan
articles.content:
Ri Yong Ho Greets FM of Azerbaijan 
 Pyongyang, May 28 (KCNA) -- Ri Yong Ho, minister of Foreign Affairs of the DPRK, Sunday sent a message of greeting to Elmar Mamediyarov, foreign minister of Azerbaijan, on the occasion of its national day.
					 In the message Ri expressed belief that the relations between the two countries would as ever continue to favorably develop and mutual support and cooperation would grow stronger in the international arena and wished him successes in his work.

articles.title: DPRK Foreign Ministry General Director Meets Slovak Counterpart
articles.content:
DPRK Foreign Ministry General Director Meets Slovak Counterpart
Pyongyang, May 28 (KCNA) -- Kim Son Kyong, general director of the European Department 2 of the Foreign Ministry of the DPRK, had a talk with Marian Tomasik, director for Asia and the Pacific of the Foreign Ministry of Slovakia, at the building of the Foreign Ministry of this country on May 26.
					 The DPRK side referred to its will to favorably develop the relations between the two countries and the positive efforts to defuse the tension of the Korean peninsula and ensure peace and stability of the region.
					
					 The Slovak side said the Slovak people have friendly feelings towards the Korean people, expressing the will to continue bilateral dialogue and exchange for promoting mutual understanding and developing the relations.
					
					 It expressed concern over the situation of the Korean peninsula going to the dangerous phase and said dialogue and negotiations are the only way for defusing the tension and settling the problems at present.

articles.title: U.S., S. Korean Warmongers' Plan to Stage Largest-ever Joint Military Drills Flailed
articles.content:
U.S., S. Korean Warmongers' Plan to Stage Largest-ever Joint Military Drills Flailed
 Pyongyang, May 28 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the National Peace Committee of Korea released a statement on Sunday to denounce the U.S. and the south Korean warmongers for planning to stage the largest-ever joint military exercises with the involvement of Carl Vinson and Ronald Reagan nuclear task forces in the waters off the Korean peninsula in upcoming June under the pretext of the DPRK's legitimate measure for bolstering the military capabilities for self-defence.
					 In the past the U.S. frequently infiltrated nuclear carrier task force into the waters off the Korean peninsula in its frantic bid to pose military threat to the DPRK. But never has it gone so desperate as now as it plans to stage the joint military drills with the introduction of the two nuclear carrier task forces.
					
					 This proves that the U.S. and the puppet warmongers' ambition for provocation of a war against the DPRK has reached the zenith, a dangerous military act of pushing the acute situation on the Korean peninsula to the worst point of explosion, the statement said, adding:
					
					 Now that the aggressors and provokers are watching for an opportunity to invade the DPRK, regarding it as a thorn in the flesh, it is quite natural for the DPRK to bolster the nuclear sword for justice to defend the destiny of the country and the nation and the life of its people. No one can find fault with this as it is an extremely just option for self-defence.
					
					 The U.S. is trying to threaten and blackmail the DPRK with the nuclear carrier but the U.S.-style bluffing can never work on the DPRK and the DPRK will remain undeterred even though more nuclear strategic assets than the two nuclear carrier task forces are brought into.
					
					 The U.S. must clearly understand that its frantic moves of holding joint military drill against the DPRK with the introduction of nuclear carrier strike groups will only make our nuclear weapons target the heart of the enemies.
					
					 The army and people of the DPRK are full of the will to make the U.S., which have committed untold crimes against the Korean nation decade after decade, suffer deadly retaliatory strikes bitter defeat.
					
					 Time and victory belong to the DPRK holding the nuclear sword of justice.

articles.title: S. Korea Urged to Give up Policy of Dependence on Outsiders
articles.content:
S. Korea Urged to Give up Policy of Dependence on Outsiders
 Pyongyang, May 28 (KCNA) -- The present chief executive of south Korea has dispatched his confidants to the U.S. and other big powers and different regions of the world under the signboard of "special envoy diplomacy" to ask for "settlement of the north's nuclear issue".
					 In this regard, Rodong Sinmun Sunday says in a commentary:
					
					 Such action is a disgraceful behavior of following in footsteps of the Park Geun Hye group, which suffered insult and cold treatment from the international community after seeking "cooperation in settling the nuclear issue of the north" from outsiders and finally faced the bitter end.
					
					 The south Korean authorities should seriously look back upon the Park Geun Hye group's foolish policy of dependence on outsiders and its catastrophic fallout.
					
					 The north-south relations were deteriorated and the situation of the Korean peninsula was extremely aggravated, due to such group of sycophantic traitors bereft of dignity and principle who spent their days asking outsiders to hurt the fellow countrymen in the north. 
					
					 It is nothing good for the destiny of the nation and the inter-Korean relations to prioritize outsiders, not compatriots, and cooperate with them.
					
					 The only way for improved north-south relations and peace and reunification is to follow the spirit of By Our Nation Itself and realize national cooperation after giving up the anachronistic policy of dependence on outsiders.
					
					 It is a mistake to try to tide over the "diplomatic crisis" due to flunkeyism and submission with the policy of dependence on outside forces.
					
					 Now is the time for the south Korean authorities to renounce the habit of dependence on outsiders, the root cause of all disasters.

articles.title: Chongryon Chairman Meets Cuban Ambassador to Japan
articles.content:
Chongryon Chairman Meets Cuban Ambassador to Japan
 Pyongyang, May 28 (KCNA) -- Ho Jong Man, chairman of the Central Standing Committee of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon), met and had a talk with Pereira Hernandez, Cuban ambassador to Japan, at the Central Hall of Chongryon in Tokyo on May 15.
					 Ho referred to the fact that the revolutionary feats performed by President Kim Il Sung together with Fidel Castro are recorded in the history of friendship between the DPRK and Cuba.
					
					 He rejoiced at Cuba's victory in the struggle with the U.S. and progress in the economic development.
					
					 The Korean people will surely win the confrontation with the U.S. to defend the dignity and sovereignty of the nation by dint of self-reliance and self-development, united as one in mind around their respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un, he said.
					
					 The Cuban ambassador noted that Cuba and the DPRK have consolidated their long-standing friendly relations as fraternal states.
					
					 The Cuban people with the history in which they have struggled against the U.S. since the Cuban revolution fully support the Korean people in the struggle to cope with the U.S. hostile policy towards the DPRK, he said, adding:
					
					 No matter how the international situation may change, the Cuba-DPRK solidarity will remain unchanged and the Cuban people will always stand by the Korean people.

articles.title: Meeting for Promotion of Japan-Korea Friendship Held in Japan
articles.content:
Meeting for Promotion of Japan-Korea Friendship Held in Japan
 Pyongyang, May 28 (KCNA) -- A meeting for promotion of Japan-Korea friendship took place in Kyoto of Japan on May 20 in celebration of the 105th birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 Attending it were Takashi Ishida, former chairman of the Kyoto Prefectural Assembly who is executive chairman of the meeting for Japan-Korea friendship in celebration of the 105th birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung and advisor to the Japan-Korea Friendship Kyoto Net for Promotion of Cultural, Scientific and Civic Exchange, and other Japanese personages and Kim Sang Il, chairman of the Kyoto Prefectural Headquarters of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon), and Koreans in Japan.
					
					 At the meeting Raitei Arima, who visited the DPRK as the honorary head of a Japanese Buddhist delegation in October last year, gave a lecture on the subject of "What I saw in the DPRK". He said he wanted to contribute to the normalization of the Japan-DPRK relations by striving to promote the exchange of visits between the two countries.
					
					 Then followed an art performance and a reception.
					
					 The participants stressed the need to make joint efforts to promote the friendship between the Korean and Japanese peoples, true to the behests of President Kim Il Sung.

articles.title: Koreans in Europe Mark Anniversary of Kwangju Popular Uprising
articles.content:
Koreans in Europe Mark Anniversary of Kwangju Popular Uprising
 Pyongyang, May 28 (KCNA) -- Koreans in Europe met in Germany on May 19-21 to commemorate the 37th anniversary of the Kwangju Popular Uprising, according to Minjok Tongsin, an internet paper of Koreans in the U.S.
					 They honored the memory of the Kwangju uprisers who fell in the resistance against the Chun Doo Hwan military fascist clique, calling for independence, democracy and reunification.
					
					 They watched a documentary film on the Kwangju uprising and heard lectures.
					
					 The participants made public a statement.
					
					 The statement expressed the will of Koreans in Europe to fully support the struggle for genuine democracy in south Korea.

articles.title: Koreans in China Hail Successful Test-fire of Pukguksong-2
articles.content:
Koreans in China Hail Successful Test-fire of Pukguksong-2
 Pyongyang, May 28 (KCNA) -- The General Association of Koreans in China on May 25 released a statement in celebration of the successful test-fire of ballistic missile Pukguksong-2 by the DPRK.
					 Hailing the test-fire of Pukguksong-2 and extending warm congratulations to the defence industrial scientists and technicians in the homeland, the statement said:
					
					 We will intensify the mass movement for ensuring peace of the Korean peninsula and achieving the unified development and co-prosperity of the nation and conduct a vigorous struggle for national security and reunification, with pride of being overseas citizens of the DPRK which displays its dignity as an earth satellite manufacturing and launching state and a nuclear weapons state.

articles.title: Swiss Bodies Brand Kwangju Bloodbath as Terrible Unethical Crime
articles.content:
Swiss Bodies Brand Kwangju Bloodbath as Terrible Unethical Crime
 Pyongyang, May 28 (KCNA) -- The Switzerland-Korea Committee and the Swiss Group for the Study of the Juche Idea issued a joint statement on May 18 on the occasion of the 37th anniversary of the Kwangju Popular Uprising.
					 The statement said that the Kwangju Popular Uprising was a heroic resistance of south Korean people to put an end to the U.S. imperialists' colonial domination and the Chun Doo Hwan military fascist clique's dictatorial rule and realize the social democracy and national reunification.
					
					 Citing detailed facts to disclose the bloodbath committed by the pro-U.S. puppet regime of south Korea under the patronage of the U.S. imperialists, it said:
					
					 The massacre in Kwangju was a terrible unethical crime.
					
					 Although the uprising ended in a failure, it delivered a staggering blow to the fascist dictators and the U.S. imperialists.
					
					 The U.S. imperialists, backstage manipulator of the bloodbath, get out of south Korea!

articles.title: Russian Magazine on Kwangju Popular Uprising
articles.content:
Russian Magazine on Kwangju Popular Uprising
 Pyongyang, May 28 (KCNA) -- Russia's online magazine Lemchich on May 23 posted an article titled "Desire of Kwangju Martyrs Should Not Be Forgotten".
					 It is 37 years since the uprising broke out in south Korea, but the uprisers' wishes for independence, democracy and reunification have not yet been realized, the article said, adding:
					
					 The uprising was a just anti-U.S., anti-fascist resistance for democracy waged to oppose the U.S. imperialists' colonial rule and demand independence and democracy of the south Korean society and national reunification.
					
					 No matter how hard the pro-American conservative group tries to distort the history, regarding the U.S., backstage manipulator of the Kwangju bloodbath, as its master, the spirit of the uprisers can never be stifled.
					
					 The pro-U.S. traitorous forces should be eliminated and the U.S. colonial rule be terminated in south Korea to satisfy the deep-rooted grudge of the Kwangju martyrs.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un vio el disparo de prueba del nuevo sistema antiaerea de intercepcion
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un vio el disparo de prueba del nuevo sistema antiaerea de intercepcion 
Pyongyang, 28 de mayo (ACNC) -- Kim Jong Un, Presidente del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y del Comite de Estado de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, vio el lanzamiento de prueba del nuevo sistema antiaerea del arma teledirigida de intercepcion, organizado por la Academia de Ciencias de Defensa Nacional.
					En el puesto de vigilancia el Maximo Dirigente recibio el informe del plan del disparo y dio la orden de lanzamiento.
					
					Viendo el disparo exitoso, dijo que este nuevo sistema acabado le hace recordar al Dirigente Kim Jong Il quien desde el inicio del desarrollo de esta arma dio las instrucciones detalladas y dedico todo lo suyo por el fortalecimiento de la capacidad nacional por la defensa aerea.
					
					Y continuo que el Dirigente se alegrara mucho si estuviera hoy en este lugar.
					
					Se mejoro mucho la capacidad de este sistema para detectar, perseguir y atacar los objetos y el grado de exactitud y fueron superados unos defectos presentados en el ano pasado, senalo a los miembros de mando del EPC y los funcionarios de la Academia de Defensa Nacional. Y hablo de la necesidad de producir en gran cantidad este sistema, cuya capacidad operacional fue verificada estrictamente, para aplastar completamente la ilusion sobre la supremacia aerea de los enemigos que se jactan de sus armas.
					
					El Maximo Dirigente presento las tareas programaticas referentes a la estrategia del desarrollo del moderno sistema antiaerea del arma teledirigida de interceptacion al estilo coreano.
					
					Le acompanaron Hwang Pong So, Ri Yong Gil, O Kum Chol, Kim Kwang Hyok, Ri Pyong Chol, Kim Jong Sik y Jong Sung Il.

articles.title: CNCDP denuncia a EE.UU. y Sur de Corea que tratan de desarrollar simulacro conjunto
articles.content:
CNCDP denuncia a EE.UU. y Sur de Corea que tratan de desarrollar simulacro conjunto
Pyongyang, 28 de mayo (ACNC) -- Al cuestionar las justas  medidas de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea para fortalecer su capacidad de autodefensa nacional, los belicistas norteamericanos y surcoreanos pretenden desarrollar en junio que viene en la zona maritima de la Peninsula Coreana los ejercicios belicos conjuntos de mayor envergadura movilizando las flotillas de portaaviones Carl Vinson y Ronald Reagan. 
					Al respecto, el portavoz del Comite Nacional Coreano por la Defensa de la Paz (CNCDP) hizo publica el dia 28 una declaracion que senala en particular:
					
					En el tiempo pasado tambien EE.UU. solia enviar las flotillas de portaaviones nucleares a la zona maritima de la Peninsula Coreana a fin de ejercer la amenaza nuclear sobre la RPDC, pero no movilizaba ninguna vez las dos flotillas de portaaviones nucleares.
					
					Esto demuestra que llego a la extremidad la ambicion agresiva de EE.UU. y los belicistas surcoreanos contra la RPDC y deviene un peligroso alboroto militar que lleva la situacion de esta peninsula a la peor fase de explosion. 
					
					Dado que los agresores y los provocadores acechan la oportunidad de agresion a la RPDC considerandola como una espina en la garganta, nuestro pais fortalecera mas los remedios nucleares de justicia para defender el destino del pais y nacion y la vida y seguridad del pueblo, lo cual constituye una justa opcion autodefensiva que no puede ser repudiada por nadie. 
					
					EE.UU. trata de amenazar y chantajear a la RPDC con los portaaviones nucleares iguales con los corpulentos animales deformados, pero esta fanfarroneria norteamericana no se sale con la suya para el pais socialista que no vacila nunca no solo ante las dos flotillas de portaaviones nucleares, sino tambien ante otras poderosas propiedades estrategicas nucleares.
					
					Cuanto mas EE.UU. intensifica los fanaticos ejercicios belicos conjuntos anti-RPDC introduciendo las flotillas de portaaviones nucleares en la zona maritima de la Peninsula Coreana, tanto mas certera se haria la punteria de las armas nucleares coreanas contra el propio territorio estadounidense.
					
					El ejercito y pueblo coreanos tienen la firme decision y voluntad para que EE.UU., que cometio siglo tras siglo y decada tras decada los incontables crimenes contra la nacion coreana, sufra el golpe de venganza y la derrota amarga nunca experimentados hasta la fecha. 
					
					El tiempo y la victoria estan al lado de la RPDC que tomo en su mano el arma nuclear de justicia.
